summary: I RECEIVED A LETTER REGARDING MY LEXUS, RECALL.  SINCE THE PART IS NOT AVAILABLE I WAS TOLD TO NOT DRIVE THE VEHICLE, AND WAS GIVEN A RENTAL CAR.  NOW I AM STUCK MAKING PYMT ON A CAR, PAYING INSURANCE ON AND STATE REGISTRATION WHICH I VE BEEN FORCED TO STORE.  AND DRIVING AN ECONOMY VEHICLE, NOT MY LUXURY LEXUS!  WITH NO KNOWN COMPLETION DATE INSIGHT.      THIS IS INSANE TO SAY THE LEAST.  IF THIS CAR IS A LEMON WHY AM I NOT ALLOWED TO TURN IT IN AS A LEMON?
